name: AWAKE (itch) (Shahryar)
description:
You have awaken on your spaceship to a loud noise. The lights are off and something is definitely wrong. You need to find out what happened.

This is my first game and I've tried to make it fun and interesting to play. I hope you like it as well. The game is about 5-7 minutes long. I've only been able to test the Windows version of the game but I have included Mac and Linux versions as well. If there is any issues with them please let me know and I'll try to fix it if I can.

Thank you very much.
